--- In gladiator@y..., johnnyoldschool@e... wrote:
> the level from DPH's set.
> 
> got a soldier through it on slaughter. i had already taken the 
soldie 
> through the first 50ish, the Tevildo, ten of mine, and DPH's first 
> three. after cheating pretty blatantly along the way with golems and 
> whatnot, i had ~level 323 and 2000 in each stat.
> 
> so! i get through the level, kill everything, i'm in the top right 
> corner, and the game slows down a little. i figure, no biggy, get to 
> the exit, and go in. i get the exit to yadda yadda message, and 
> hit "y". i then get the Congratulations message without the 
> congratulations graphic telling me i got level 982. i figure, nifty! 
> then the game crashes, granular page limits and whatnot. now the 
game 
> won't work! what's up with that?! i try to start it and all i get is 
> the forgotten sages screen, then nothing.
> 
> suggestions?

You crashed the game by getting an experience level too high.  The 
only solution I know of is to delete save0.gtl from the folder where 
gladiator is.  This will erase the current team from memory and allow 
you to continue the game.  

*I* can crash the game after completing 5-6 scenarios because of 
getting experience level too high.

Note: that's why I strongly advise AGAINST anyone trying to continue 
making teams too powerfull.  Once you get to experience level 250, 
your character is powerfull enough.

If a new scenario editor is developed, I would highly recommend 
putting limits on high how experince level character you can put in a 
scenario.

  Once, the tournament group gets to a certain point, I'll shift the 
50 project into high gear.  I want a team (more than 4 characters) to 
send through my own scenarios.
